Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment

Class ThemeFragment<T extends DynamicAppTheme>

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.fragment.DynamicFragment
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.fragment.ThemeFragment<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the dynamic app theme this fragment will handle.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.core.view.MenuProvider, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, DynamicLifecycle, DynamicSearchListener, DynamicTransitionListener, ThemeListener<T>, ThemeListener.Export<T>, ThemeListener.Import<T>, ThemeListener.Value
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicRemoteThemeFragment, DynamicThemeFragment
public abstract class ThemeFragment<T extends DynamicAppTheme> extends DynamicFragment implements ThemeListener.Value, ThemeListener.Import<T>, ThemeListener.Export<T>
Base theme fragment to provide theme editing functionality.

Extend this fragment to implement theme attributes according to the requirements.
